biotools.summary: HIVcoPRED: is a web server developed for predicting the coreceptor usage by HIV-1. It takes amino acid sequences of Variable loop (V3) of gp120 protein of HIV and predicts the coreceptor used by the HIV strain.

bioschemas.name: hivcopred
